title: Magnum Dinner
desc: MAGNUM DINNER Location: Kalie Restaurant 5722 Melrose Ave Los Angeles, CA 90038 Large pours from large bottles  Limited to 30 guests (Up to 15 Magnums will be opened) ? Welcome ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? Thank you ? FINE PRINT:? If we are small, we will go with a smaller list of wines - but all the red collectables will be opened. As we get larger - we will expand the wine selection? up to 15 Magnums.? The price of this event is not based on any one wine, over $500 worth of wine (at restaurant prices) will be opened per guest. This is a value for the wine lover - and drinking from magnum takes wine to another level.? We have been in business since 1995 and maintain a very strong approval rating because we do things well, and we do things right - we are a trusted source of quality wine and quality events - Ian Blackburn, Student in the Master of Wine program and noted expert will host this event.? Detailed notes will be provided to all guests - all dietary restrictions can be met with advanced notice?. menu and location? will be disclosed as date approaches.
